text: Then Moab [strongs id="h4124" /] rebelled [strongs id="h6586" tvm="8799" /] against Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] the death [strongs id="h4194" /] of Ahab [strongs id="h0256" /].

And Ahaziah [strongs id="h0274" /] fell down [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8799" /] through a lattice [strongs id="h7639" /] in his upper chamber [strongs id="h5944" /] that [was] in Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /], and was sick [strongs id="h2470" tvm="8799" /]: and he sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] messengers [strongs id="h4397" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto them, Go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /], enquire [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8798" /] of Baalzebub [strongs id="h1176" /] the god [strongs id="h0430" /] of Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /] whether I shall recover [strongs id="h2421" tvm="8799" /] of this disease [strongs id="h2483" /].

But the angel [strongs id="h4397" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] to Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] the Tishbite [strongs id="h8664" /], Arise [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8798" /], go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8798" /] to meet [strongs id="h7125" tvm="8800" /] the messengers [strongs id="h4397" /] of the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /], and say [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8761" /] unto them, [Is it] not because [there is] not a God [strongs id="h0430" /] in Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], [that] ye go [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8802" /] to enquire [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8800" /] of Baalzebub [strongs id="h1176" /] the god [strongs id="h0430" /] of Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /]?

Now therefore thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], Thou shalt not come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] from that bed [strongs id="h4296" /] on which thou art gone up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /], but shalt surely [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8800" /] die [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /]. And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] departed [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /].

And when the messengers [strongs id="h4397" /] turned back [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] unto him, he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto them, Why are ye now [strongs id="h2088" /] turned back [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /]?

And they said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, There came [strongs id="h5927" /] a man [strongs id="h0376" /] up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] to meet [strongs id="h7125" tvm="8800" /] us, and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto us, Go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /], turn again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /] unto the king [strongs id="h4428" /] that sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] you, and say [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] unto him, Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], [Is it] not because [there is] not a God [strongs id="h0430" /] in Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], [that] thou sendest [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8802" /] to enquire [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8800" /] of Baalzebub [strongs id="h1176" /] the god [strongs id="h0430" /] of Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /]? therefore thou shalt not come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] from that bed [strongs id="h4296" /] on which thou art gone up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /], but shalt surely [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8800" /] die [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /].

And he said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto them, What manner [strongs id="h4941" /] of man [strongs id="h0376" /] [was he] which came up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] to meet [strongs id="h7125" tvm="8800" /] you, and told [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] you these words [strongs id="h1697" /]?

And they answered [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] him, [He was] an hairy [strongs id="h8181" /] man [strongs id="h1167" /] [strongs id="h0376" /], and girt [strongs id="h0247" tvm="8803" /] with a girdle [strongs id="h0232" /] of leather [strongs id="h5785" /] about his loins [strongs id="h4975" /]. And he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], It [is] Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] the Tishbite [strongs id="h8664" /].

Then the king [strongs id="h4428" /] sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] unto him a captain [strongs id="h8269" /] of fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] with his fifty [strongs id="h2572" /]. And he went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] to him: and, behold, he sat [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] on the top [strongs id="h7218" /] of an hill [strongs id="h2022" /]. And he spake [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto him, Thou man [strongs id="h0376" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /], the king [strongs id="h4428" /] hath said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /], Come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8798" /].

And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] to the captain [strongs id="h8269" /] of fifty [strongs id="h2572" /], If I [be] a man [strongs id="h0376" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /], then let fire [strongs id="h0784" /] come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] from heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and consume [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /] thee and thy fifty [strongs id="h2572" /]. And there came down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] fire [strongs id="h0784" /] from heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and consumed [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /] him and his fifty [strongs id="h2572" /].

Again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] also he sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] unto him another [strongs id="h0312" /] captain [strongs id="h8269" /] of fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] with his fifty [strongs id="h2572" /]. And he answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto him, O man [strongs id="h0376" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /], thus hath the king [strongs id="h4428" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /], Come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8798" /] quickly [strongs id="h4120" /].

And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto them, If I [be] a man [strongs id="h0376" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /], let fire [strongs id="h0784" /] come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] from heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and consume [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /] thee and thy fifty [strongs id="h2572" /]. And the fire [strongs id="h0784" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /] came down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] from heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and consumed [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /] him and his fifty [strongs id="h2572" /].

And he sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] a captain [strongs id="h8269" /] of the third [strongs id="h7992" /] fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] with his fifty [strongs id="h2572" /]. And the third [strongs id="h7992" /] captain [strongs id="h8269" /] of fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /], and came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] and fell [strongs id="h3766" tvm="8799" /] on his knees [strongs id="h1290" /] before [strongs id="h5048" /] Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /], and besought [strongs id="h2603" tvm="8691" /] him, and said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto him, O man [strongs id="h0376" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /], I pray thee, let my life [strongs id="h5315" /], and the life [strongs id="h5315" /] of these fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] thy servants [strongs id="h5650" /], be precious [strongs id="h3365" tvm="8799" /] in thy sight [strongs id="h5869" /].

Behold, there came [strongs id="h3381" /] fire [strongs id="h0784" /] down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8804" /] from heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and burnt up [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /] the two [strongs id="h8147" /] captains [strongs id="h8269" /] of the former [strongs id="h7223" /] fifties [strongs id="h2572" /] with their fifties [strongs id="h2572" /]: therefore let my life [strongs id="h5315" /] now be precious [strongs id="h3365" tvm="8799" /] in thy sight [strongs id="h5869" /].

And the angel [strongs id="h4397" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /], Go down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8798" /] with him: be not afraid [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] of him [strongs id="h6440" /]. And he said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto him, Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], Forasmuch as thou hast sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] messengers [strongs id="h4397" /] to enquire [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8800" /] of Baalzebub [strongs id="h1176" /] the god [strongs id="h0430" /] of Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /], [is it] not because [there is] no God [strongs id="h0430" /] in Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] to enquire [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8800" /] of his word [strongs id="h1697" /]? therefore thou shalt not come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] off that bed [strongs id="h4296" /] on which thou art gone up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /], but shalt surely [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8800" /] die [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /].

So he died [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /] according to the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] which Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] had spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /]. And Jehoram [strongs id="h3088" /] reigned [strongs id="h4427" tvm="8799" /] in his stead in the second [strongs id="h8147" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /] of Jehoram [strongs id="h3088" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Jehoshaphat [strongs id="h3092" /] king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /]; because he had no son [strongs id="h1121" /].

Now the rest [strongs id="h3499" /] of the acts [strongs id="h1697" /] of Ahaziah [strongs id="h0274" /] which he did [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /], [are] they not written [strongs id="h3789" tvm="8803" /] in the book [strongs id="h5612" /] of the chronicles [strongs id="h1697" /] [strongs id="h3117" /] of the kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /]?

And it came to pass, when the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] would take up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8687" /] Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] into heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] by a whirlwind [strongs id="h5591" /], that Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] with Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /] from Gilgal [strongs id="h1537" /].

And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /], Tarry [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8798" /] here, I pray thee; for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] me to Bethel [strongs id="h1008" /]. And the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /] that [were] at Bethel [strongs id="h1008" /] came forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] to Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Knowest [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] thou that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will take away [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8802" /] thy master [strongs id="h0113" /] from thy head [strongs id="h7218" /] to day [strongs id="h3117" /]? And he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Yea, I know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] [it]; hold ye your peace [strongs id="h2814" tvm="8685" /].

And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /], tarry [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8798" /] here, I pray thee; for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] me to Jericho [strongs id="h3405" /]. And the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /] that [were] at Jericho [strongs id="h3405" /] came [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8799" /] to Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Knowest [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] thou that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will take away [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8802" /] thy master [strongs id="h0113" /] from thy head [strongs id="h7218" /] to day [strongs id="h3117" /]? And he answered [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Yea, I know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] [it]; hold ye your peace [strongs id="h2814" tvm="8685" /].

And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Tarry [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8798" /], I pray thee, here; for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] me to Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /]. And he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], [As] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] liveth [strongs id="h2416" /], and [as] thy soul [strongs id="h5315" /] liveth [strongs id="h2416" /], I will not leave [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8799" /] thee. And fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] men [strongs id="h0376" /] of the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /] went [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /], and stood [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] to view [strongs id="h5048" /] afar off [strongs id="h7350" /]: and they two [strongs id="h8147" /] stood [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8804" /] by Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /].

And Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] took [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] his mantle [strongs id="h0155" /], and wrapped [it] together [strongs id="h1563" tvm="8799" /], and smote [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] the waters [strongs id="h4325" /], and they were divided [strongs id="h2673" tvm="8735" /] hither and thither, so that they two [strongs id="h8147" /] went over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /] on dry [strongs id="h2724" /] ground.

And it came to pass, when they were gone over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8800" /], that Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] unto Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /], Ask [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8798" /] what I shall do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] for thee, before I be taken away [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8735" /] from thee. And he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Thou hast asked [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8800" /] a hard thing [strongs id="h7185" tvm="8689" /]: [nevertheless], if thou see [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /] me [when I am] taken [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8795" /] from thee, it shall be so unto thee; but if not, it shall not be [so].

And it came to pass, as they still [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8800" /] went on [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8802" /], and talked [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8763" /], that, behold, [there appeared] a chariot [strongs id="h7393" /] of fire [strongs id="h0784" /], and horses [strongs id="h5483" /] of fire [strongs id="h0784" /], and parted [strongs id="h6504" tvm="8686" /] them both [strongs id="h8147" /] asunder [strongs id="h0996" /]; and Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] by a whirlwind [strongs id="h5591" /] into heaven [strongs id="h8064" /].

And Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /] saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8802" /] [it], and he cried [strongs id="h6817" tvm="8764" /], My father [strongs id="h0001" /], my father [strongs id="h0001" /], the chariot [strongs id="h7393" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], and the horsemen [strongs id="h6571" /] thereof. He took up [strongs id="h7311" tvm="8686" /] also the mantle [strongs id="h0155" /] of Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] that fell [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8804" /] from him, and went back [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /], and stood [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] by the bank [strongs id="h8193" /] of Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /];

And he took [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] the mantle [strongs id="h0155" /] of Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /] that fell [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8804" /] from him, and smote [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] the waters [strongs id="h4325" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Where [is] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] God [strongs id="h0430" /] of Elijah [strongs id="h0452" /]? and when he also had smitten [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] the waters [strongs id="h4325" /], they parted [strongs id="h2673" tvm="8735" /] hither and thither: and Elisha [strongs id="h0477" /] went over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /].

And they said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Behold now, there be [strongs id="h3426" /] with thy servants [strongs id="h5650" /] fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] strong [strongs id="h2428" /] men [strongs id="h1121" /] [strongs id="h0582" /]; let them go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /], we pray thee, and seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8762" /] thy master [strongs id="h0113" /]: lest peradventure the Spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath taken him up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /], and cast [strongs id="h7993" tvm="8686" /] him upon some [strongs id="h0259" /] mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], or into some [strongs id="h0259" /] valley [strongs id="h1516" /]. And when they urged [strongs id="h6484" tvm="8799" /] him till he was ashamed [strongs id="h0954" tvm="8800" /], he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8798" /].
